author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Enforcement wing of Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation (Tangedco) detected a case of energy theft during a surprise at an industrial service connection at Ponneri in Tiruvallur district.

An amount of Rs. eight lakh was levied as penalty on the consumer for loss sustained by the Corporation. The service connection of the consumer was disconnected as only part payment of Rs. 1.45 lakh was paid and Rs. 1.05 lakh was levied on the consumer as compounding fees to avert any criminal proceedings. —staff reporter
title: Tangedco detects energy theft
